Unnamed: 1: REMEDIATION
C6 How does the company enable effective remedy if people are harmed by its actions or decisions in relation to a salient human rights issue?
Unnamed: 2: See our Human Rights Position Statement and Action Plan: Section 3 ('Our commitment and approach to respecting and advancing human rights'), Section 7 ('Feedback, complaints and questions') and Section B.2 ('Our plan').
